item.title: About Me
item.description: I was born on 10/10/1999 in Bursa. I studying Public Relations and Advertising on Anadolu University. Outside of school, I’m an influencer marketing intern and a blogger. I enjoy experiencing new excitements and experiences. I am an avid follower of F1 races. In my spare time, I watch fantasy/science fiction series such as Rick and Morty and Star Trek. I am interested in cooking and trying different flavors. I like to blog about different topics.

item.title: CV
item.description: Below I am sharing my CV with you.
